original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Write thou these words: for after the tenor of these words I have made a covenant with thee and with Israel.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 이 말들을 기록하라 내가 이 말들의 뜻대로 너와 이스라엘과 언약을 세웠음이니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses
for after the tenor of these words
I have made a covenant with thee and with Israel.
